name: Swarm (itch) (DigNZ)
description:
Your town has been attacked by a PLAGUE of locusts. Your deliveries must still get through!

Use the shuffled deck of cards to plan your delivery - RAIN and INSECTS can destroy your produce so work efficiently. Complete your deliveries and aim form maximum profit.

A game made in with not enough time for the Godot Wild Jam #18 on the theme PLAGUE. Also including wild cards of 80s, Chance and Weather.

Using Godot 3.2 as the master branch wouldn't run.
